caption.center: WILLIAM T. HOLLIDAY, Appellant, v. WALTER A. McNEIL, Secretary, Florida

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Leon County. Charles A. Francis, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
William T. Holliday, pro se, for Appellant.
Bill McCollum, Attorney General, and Lance Eric Neff, Assistant Attorney General, Tallahassee, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED. WOLF, KAHN, and VAN NORTWICK, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED
